coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: Small embroidered lettering informs you that this rope was enchanted by 'Norin'.
coreAttributes.name: arcane decorative rope
coreAttributes.description: A bundle of rope specially enchanted to tie various body parts in decorative bondage.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] the arcane rope against [npc.her] [npc.mouthColour], watching as it quickly ties itself into a gag.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] the arcane rope against [npc2.namePos] [npc2.mouthColour], watching as it quickly ties itself into a gag.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the arcane rope against [npc2.namePos] [npc2.mouthColour], watching as it quickly ties itself into a tight gag.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the rope gagging [npc.her], watching as it neatly bundles itself up.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the rope gagging [npc2.name], watching as it neatly bundles itself up.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] on the rope gagging [npc2.name], causing it to quickly untie before bundling itself up.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(rest)] the arcane rope on [npc.her] [npc.breasts+], watching as it quickly ties itself into a decorative harness.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(rest)] the arcane rope on [npc2.namePos] [npc2.breasts+], watching as it quickly ties itself into a decorative harness.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the arcane rope against [npc2.namePos] [npc2.breasts+], watching as it tightly ties itself into a decorative harness.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the rope around [npc.her] [npc.breasts+], watching as it neatly bundles itself up.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the rope around [npc2.namePos] [npc2.breasts+], watching as it neatly bundles itself up.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] on the rope around [npc2.namePos] [npc2.breasts+], causing it to quickly untie before bundling itself up.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(rest)] the arcane rope on [npc.her] stomach, watching as it quickly ties itself into a decorative corset.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(rest)] the arcane rope on [npc2.namePos] stomach, watching as it quickly ties itself into a decorative corset.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the arcane rope against [npc2.namePos] stomach, watching as it tightly ties itself into a decorative corset.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the rope around [npc.her] stomach, watching as it neatly bundles itself up.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the rope around [npc2.namePos] stomach, watching as it neatly bundles itself up.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] on the rope around [npc2.namePos] stomach, causing it to quickly untie before bundling itself up.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] a loose section of rope, watching as it ties itself around [npc.her] crotch.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] a loose section of rope, watching as it ties itself around [npc2.namePos] crotch.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] a loose section of rope, watching as it ties itself tightly around [npc2.namePos] crotch.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the rope around [npc.her] crotch, causing it to untie itself.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the rope around [npc2.namePos] crotch, causing it to untie itself.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] on the rope around [npc2.namePos] crotch, causing it to quickly untie itself.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(rest)] the arcane rope on [npc.her] groin, watching as it quickly ties itself into a decorative harness.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(rest)] the arcane rope on [npc2.namePos] groin, watching as it quickly ties itself into a decorative harness.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the arcane rope against [npc2.namePos] groin, watching as it tightly ties itself into a decorative harness.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the rope around [npc.her] groin, watching as it neatly bundles itself up.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the rope around [npc2.namePos] groin, watching as it neatly bundles itself up.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] on the rope around [npc2.namePos] groin, causing it to quickly untie before bundling itself up.
